pageProduct.name: Optrex Actimist Dry Eye 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Optrex ActiMist Eye Spray for dry, tired & itchy eyes (Dry, tired & itchy eyes due to disturbed lipid layer of the tear film, approx. 80% of dry eye cases).

- Stabilises the eye's natural protective moisture barrier. 
- May be used up to 6 months after opening. 
- Can be applied when wearing eye make up (when sprayed once 20cm from your closed eye lid). 


Relieves Refreshes, Revives
Modern living (such as computer work & air conditioning), pollen in the r, ageing & contact lens wear can cause the eye's natural protective moisture barrier to break up, leaving your eyes feeling dry, tired & itchy. Optrex ActiMist Eye Spray gives you lasting relief in a quick easy spray:
- Stabilises the eye's natural protective moisture barrier.
- Helps moisturise the eye.
- It's quick & easy to apply - just spray on closed eyes anytime, anywhere to cool & soothe without even having to touch your eye.


 

Suitable For: Suitable to use with contact lenses.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

Before use please read enclosed information leaflet.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Before use please read enclosed information leaflet.

Ingredients

1mL contains: 10mg Soy Lecithin, 8mg Sodium Chloride, 8mg Ethanol, 5mg Phenoxyethanol, 0.25mg Vitamin A Palmitate, 0.02mg Vitamin E, Purified Water.

Directions

- When using for the first time, push down on the nozzle 3-4 times.
- Hold 10cm from your closed eyelid.
- Spray 1-2 times onto your closed eyelids 3 to 4 times per day.

How Optrex ActiMist Eye Spray for dry, tired & itchy eyes works:
- Sprays directly onto CLOSED eyelids.
- Stabilises the eye's natural tear film.
- Cools, soothes and refreshes.
- May be used up to 6 months after first opening.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store at room temperature between 2°C and 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Between 2°C and 25°C.
